item.description:
This was a great film with Mary Tyler Moore and Julie Andrews, and now it has been adapted to a modern musical that has won a ton of Tonys. And one of our members, Margaret, is in the show!

Tickets are $18. Please reserve your own ticket through Community Players. The show starts at 8 pm. It's General Admission so we'll meet in the lobby at 7:15 pm so we can sit together. The line to get into the theatre forms early, so please be on time. The Community Players perform at Jenks High School in Pawtucket.

Summary
Thoroughly Modern Millie is a Tony Award-winning musical with music by Jeanine Tesori, lyrics by Dick Scanlan, and a book by Richard Morris and Scanlan. Based on the 1967 film of the same name, Thoroughly Modern Millie tells the story of a small-town girl, Millie Dillmount, who comes to New York City to marry for money instead of love â€“ a thoroughly modern aim in 1922, when women were just entering the workforce. Millie soon begins to take to delight in the flapper lifestyle, but problems arise when she checks into a hotel owned by the leader of a white slavery ring in China.

Here's a YouTube clip.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby near the door, I will have small Meetup sign
item.name: Thoroughly Modern Millie - Pawtucket Comm. Players
